links.title: AAPL breaks key support level
links.description: Feb 20, 2018 [1 min read] Highlights: AAPL breaks key support level Overview Moving lower for the 2nd day in a row, AAPL ended Tuesday at 171.85 edging lower $0.58 (-0.34%) on low volume. Trading $2.21 higher after the open, Apple was unable to hold its gains as the bears took control ending the day below its opening price.
